about_the_game:
Serial Victims is a 3D psychological horror game that immerses you in the nightmares of individuals who fell prey to serial killers. In Serial Victims, you embody each victim, racing against time to uncover clues, call for help, and perform various actions before the inevitable happens. Your ultimate objective is to have the victims assist in catching the killer with as few victims as possible.

Survival is not the goal. Instead, your aim is to do what you can within the time you have left.





Serial Victims gives a fresh and replayable horror experience. Each playthrough is randomized, ensuring that no two experiences are the same:

  • Unique players: Each victim is different, their name, speed, and reactions to their surroundings.
  • Unique Killers: Encounter various serial killers, each with distinct methods, personalities, and motives, making each investigation a unique challenge.
  • Immersive Experience: Realistic graphics and sounds, combined with a minimal user interface, ensure a completely immersive experience that will keep you on edge.
  • Locations: Explore over 5 different crime scenes, each with unique twists, hiding spots, and layouts.

content_descriptors.notes: Serial Victims follows the victims of fictitious serial killers in a psychologic horror theme, where the players takes on the role of the victims. The game is randomized and does not take from real life stories but can be violent in nature and has realistic aspects.
